U

updateData(Hashtable<String, Integer>) - Method in class javanews.gui.internalframe.LinkChart
Updates the data set for both charts with the contents of the supplied Hashtable.
updateDetails() - Method in class javanews.database.SQLStatements
Returns the SQL string used to update the details and description of a recognised link within the database.
updateDetailsAndDescription(String, String, String) - Method in class javanews.database.DbInterface
Updates the details and description fields of a specific link within the recognised link table.
updateJNPrefs() - Static method in class javanews.object.JNPreferences
Used to update any changes within the preferences to the main XML file.
updateLinkIDs(String, String) - Method in class javanews.database.DbInterface
Changes the values within the tblReceivedMessages table within the database for a discovered PSE link.
updateNewLinkID() - Method in class javanews.database.SQLStatements
Returns the SQL string used to change a link id from discovered to recognised.
URLClickListener - Class in javanews.events.gui
Used to detect the user attempting to navigate through HTML links embedded within any HTML content displayed within a JEditorPane.
URLClickListener() - Constructor for class javanews.events.gui.URLClickListener
Used to initilise the class and internal logger.
